text: "If I Fell" is a 1964 song by The Beatles. It was taken from their album A Hard Day's Night and is the B-side to the single And I Love Her. It went to number 53 in the United States, number 28 in Canada and topped the chart in Norway. == References == Category:1964 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:The Beatles songs Category:Chet Atkins songs
title: If I Fell
